name: randomanimal
0:
”Alexa, open random animal”
”Alexa, start random animal”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random animal
des: A skill that will help you to feel a different type of animals by playing sounds and showing random animal images. It's easy to use, just ask Alexa to open random animal and she will pick one animal randomly. Right now Alexa knows ten types of animals, but she will learn more pretty soon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
